prompt: Search for the latest version of PyTorch and check if it's compatible with Python 3.11.
teacher_text:
The latest stable version of PyTorch is **2.2.1** (released March 2024), and **yes, it is fully compatible with Python 3.11**.

### Key Details:
- **Python 3.11 support** was officially added starting with **PyTorch 2.0** (April 2023)
- All subsequent versions (2.1.x, 2.2.x) maintain full compatibility with Python 3.11
- Python 3.11 offers performance improvements that work well with PyTorch

### Installation Command:
You can install the latest version with:
```bash
pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio
```

Or specifically for Python 3.11 with CUDA support (if you have an NVIDIA GPU):
```bash
pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121
```

For CPU-only version:
```bash
pip3 install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu
```

You can verify your installation and check the version in Python:
```python
import torch
print(f"PyTorch version: {torch.__version__}")
print(f"Python version: {torch.sys.version}")
```

**Note**: Always check the official [PyTorch website](https://pytorch.org/) for the most current version and installation instructions specific to your system configuration.
